Authentication Rest APIÂ¶

Overview

Resource Operation Description
GSS GET /auth/gss Authenticate with GSS token
SSH GET /auth/ssh Authenticate with SSH key exchange.
SSHChallengeToken GET /auth/ssh_challenge_token Request SSH Challenge Token
UserPass GET /auth/userpass Authenticate with username/password
Validate GET /auth/validate Validate a Rucio Auth Token.
x509 GET /auth/x509 Authenticate with x509 certificate.
  GET /auth/x509_proxy  

Details

GET /auth/ssh_challenge_tokenÂ¶

Request a challenge token for SSH authentication

Request Headers:
 
  • Rucio-Account â Account identifier as a string.
  • Rucio-AppID â Application identifier as a string.
Response Headers:
 
  • Access-Control-Allow-Origin â
  • Access-Control-Allow-Headers â
  • Access-Control-Allow-Methods â
  • Access-Control-Allow-Credentials â
  • Access-Control-Expose-Headers â
  • X-Rucio-Auth-Token â The authentication token
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK â Successfully authenticated
  • 404 Not Found â Invalid credentials
GET /auth/x509Â¶
GET /auth/x509_proxyÂ¶

Authenticate a Rucio account temporarily via an x509 certificate.

Request Headers:
 
  • Rucio-Account â Account identifier as a string.
  • Rucio-AppID â Application identifier as a string.
  • SSLStdEnv â Apache mod_ssl SSL Standard Env Variables.
Response Headers:
 
  • Access-Control-Allow-Origin â
  • Access-Control-Allow-Headers â
  • Access-Control-Allow-Methods â
  • Access-Control-Allow-Credentials â
  • Access-Control-Expose-Headers â
  • X-Rucio-Auth-Token â The authentication token
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK â Successfully authenticated
  • 404 Not Found â Invalid credentials
GET /auth/userpassÂ¶

Authenticate a Rucio account temporarily via username and password.

Request Headers:
 
  • X-Rucio-Account â Account identifier as a string.
  • X-Rucio-Username â Username as a string.
  • X-Rucio-Password â SHA1 hash of the password as a string.
  • X-Rucio-AppID â Application identifier as a string.
Response Headers:
 
  • Access-Control-Allow-Origin â
  • Access-Control-Allow-Headers â
  • Access-Control-Allow-Methods â
  • Access-Control-Allow-Credentials â
  • Access-Control-Expose-Headers â
  • X-Rucio-Auth-Token â The authentication token
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK â Successfully authenticated
  • 404 Not Found â Invalid credentials
GET /auth/validateÂ¶

Validate a Rucio Auth Token.

Request Headers:
 
  • Rucio-Auth-Token â as a variable-length string.
Returns:

Tuple(account name, token lifetime).
GET /auth/gssÂ¶

Authenticate a Rucio account temporarily via a GSS token.

Request Headers:
 
  • Rucio-Account â Account identifier as a string.
  • Rucio-AppID â Application identifier as a string.
  • SavedCredentials â Apache mod_auth_kerb SavedCredentials.
Response Headers:
 
  • Access-Control-Allow-Origin â
  • Access-Control-Allow-Headers â
  • Access-Control-Allow-Methods â
  • Access-Control-Allow-Credentials â
  • Access-Control-Expose-Headers â
  • X-Rucio-Auth-Token â The authentication token
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK â Successfully authenticated
  • 404 Not Found â Invalid credentials
GET /auth/sshÂ¶

Authenticate a Rucio account temporarily via SSH key exchange.

Request Headers:
 
  • Rucio-Account â Account identifier as a string.
  • Rucio-SSH-Signature â Response to server challenge signed with SSH private key as a base64 encoded string.
  • Rucio-AppID â Application identifier as a string.
Response Headers:
 
  • Access-Control-Allow-Origin â
  • Access-Control-Allow-Headers â
  • Access-Control-Allow-Methods â
  • Access-Control-Allow-Credentials â
  • Access-Control-Expose-Headers â
  • X-Rucio-Auth-Token â The authentication token
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK â Successfully authenticated
  • 404 Not Found â Invalid credentials
